entry.value: SELECT SOURCE_DIRECTORY srcDir, PROCESSED_DIRECTORY procDir, UNPROCSSED_DIRECTORY unProcDir, ACK_DIRECTORY ackDir, WORKING_DIRECTORY workingDir FROM T_FIELD_MAPPING WHERE FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE AND AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_FORMAT =:FILE_FORMAT

SELECT FIELD_TYPE, FIELD_NAME, START_POSITION, END_POSITION, VALIDATION_TYPE, VALIDATION_VALUE, FIELD_INDEX_POSITION, FILE_LEVEL_REJECTION, IS_POJO_VALUE FROM T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL INNER JOIN T_FIELD_MAPPING T_FIELD_MAPPING ON T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL.FIELD_MAPPING_PK_ID=T_FIELD_MAPPING.ID WHERE AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_TYPE='ICRX' ORDER BY FIELD_INDEX_POSITION

SELECT FIELD_TYPE, FIELD_NAME, START_POSITION, END_POSITION, VALIDATION_TYPE, VALIDATION_VALUE, FIELD_INDEX_POSITION, IS_POJO_VALUE FROM T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL INNER JOIN T_FIELD_MAPPING T_FIELD_MAPPING ON T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL.FIELD_MAPPING_PK_ID=T_FIELD_MAPPING.ID WHERE AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_TYPE='IRXC' ORDER BY FIELD_INDEX_POSITION

INSERT INTO T_LANE_TX_CHECKPOINT ( FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, PROCESS_NAME, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_STATUS, TX_DATE, LANE_TX_ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, FILE_COUNT, PROCESSED_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT, EXCEPTION_COUNT, UPDATE_TS ) VALUES (:FILE_NAME, :FILE_TYPE, :PROCESS_NAME, :PROCESS_ID, :PROCESS_STATUS, :TX_DATE, :LANE_TX_ID, :SERIAL_NUMBER, :FILE_COUNT, :PROCESSED_COUNT, :SUCCESS_COUNT, :EXCEPTION_COUNT, :UPDATE_TS)

SELECT XFER_CONTROL_ID, XFER_FILE_ID, XFER_FILE_NAME, DATE_CREATED, TIME_CREATED, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CHECKSUM, NUM_RECS, HASH_TOTAL, XFER_PATH, XFER_XMIT_STATUS, XFER_RETRY, UPDATE_TS, FILE_TYPE FROM T_XFER_CONTROL WHERE XFER_FILE_NAME=:XFER_FILE_NAME AND XFER_XMIT_STATUS=:XFER_XMIT_STATUS

INSERT INTO T_QATP_STATSTICS (FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_TIME, RECORD_COUNT, AMOUNT, IS_PROCESSED, PROCESS_DATE, PROCESS_TIME, PROCESS_REC_COUNT, UPDATE_TS) VALUES( :FILE_TYPE, :FILE_NAME, :INSERT_DATE, :INSERT_TIME, :RECORD_COUNT, :AMOUNT, :IS_PROCESSED, :PROCESS_DATE, :PROCESS_TIME, :PROCESS_REC_COUNT, :UPDATE_TS )
update INVALID_ADDRESS_ID SET INVALID_ADDRESS_ID:=INVALID_ADDRESS_ID

Update T_LANE_TX_CHECKPOINT SET PROCESS_STATUS = :PROCESS_STATUS, FILE_COUNT=:FILE_COUNT, UPDATE_TS=:UPDATE_TS, PROCESSED_COUNT=:PROCESSED_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT=:SUCCESS_COUNT, EXCEPTION_COUNT=:EXCEPTION_COUNT, SERIAL_NUMBER=:SERIAL_NUMBER WHERE FILE_NAME =:FILE_NAME AND FILE_TYPE =:FILE_TYPE

Update T_LANE_TX_CHECKPOINT SET PROCESS_STATUS = :PROCESS_STATUS, FILE_COUNT=:FILE_COUNT, UPDATE_TS=:UPDATE_TS, PROCESSED_COUNT=:PROCESSED_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT=:SUCCESS_COUNT, EXCEPTION_COUNT=:EXCEPTION_COUNT, LANE_TX_ID=:LANE_TX_ID WHERE FILE_NAME =:FILE_NAME AND FILE_TYPE =:FILE_TYPE

SELECT AGENCY_ID, AGENCY_NAME, AGENCY_SHORT_NAME, CONSORTIUM, DEVICE_PREFIX, IS_HOME_AGENCY, PARENT_AGENCY_ID, FILE_PREFIX FROM CRM.T_AGENCY WHERE AGENCY_ID IN (SELECT PARENT_AGENCY_ID FROM CRM.T_AGENCY) AND IS_HOME_AGENCY = 'N' AND CONSORTIUM = 'IAG' AND DEVICE_PREFIX <'100' ORDER BY AGENCY_ID

INSERT INTO T_IA_ACK_STATUS ( ACK_FILE_NAME, ACK_FILE_DATE, ACK_FILE_TIME, ACK_FILE_STATUS, TRX_FILE_NAME, RECON_FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, FROM_AGENCY, TO_AGENCY, EXTERN_FILE_ID, ATP_FILE_ID) VALUES ( :ACK_FILE_NAME, :ACK_FILE_DATE, :ACK_FILE_TIME, :ACK_FILE_STATUS, :TRX_FILE_NAME, :RECON_FILE_NAME, :FILE_TYPE, :FROM_AGENCY, :TO_AGENCY, :EXTERN_FILE_ID, :ATP_FILE_ID)

INSERT INTO T_OA_ADDRESS ( INVALID_ADDRESS_ID ) VALUES ( INAVLID_ADDRESS_ID
)
SELECT * FROM MASTER.T_CODES WHERE CODE_TYPE='TX_STATUS'
SELECT * FROM CRM.V_PLAN_POLICY
SELECT XFER_CONTROL_ID, DATE_CREATED FROM MASTER.T_XFER_CONTROL WHERE XFER_CONTROL_ID=:XFER_CONTROL_ID
SELECT * FROM MASTER.T_PROCESS_PARAMETERS WHERE PARAM_NAME='IAG_AGENCY_SYS_ACCOUNT_ID' ORDER BY 1
SELECT PLAZA_ID,EXTERN_PLAZA_ID,AGENCY_ID ,REVENUE_TIME ,PLAZA_GROUP ,PLAZA_TYPE_IND ,CALCULATE_TOLL_AMOUNT,LPR_ENABLED FROM MASTER.T_PLAZA

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_AWAY_AGENCY_TX(LANE_TX_ID,ETC_ACCOUNT_ID,TX_STATUS,TX_DATE,POSTED_DATE,DEPOSIT_ID,TX_TIMESTAMP,REVENUE_DATE,TX_EXTERN_REF_NO,EXTERN_FILE_ID,PLAZA_AGENCY_ID,PLAZA_ID,LANE_ID,DEVICE_NO,PLATE_COUNTRY,PLATE_NUMBER,PLATE_STATE,UPDATE_TS,ROW_ID,ETC_DUP_SERIAL_NUM) VALUES(:LANE_TX_ID,:ETC_ACCOUNT_ID,:TX_STATUS,:TX_DATE,:POSTED_DATE,:DEPOSIT_ID,:TX_TIMESTAMP,:REVENUE_DATE,:TX_EXTERN_REF_NO,:EXTERN_FILE_ID,:PLAZA_AGENCY_ID,:PLAZA_ID,:LANE_ID,:DEVICE_NO,:PLATE_COUNTRY,:PLATE_NUMBER,:PLATE_STATE,:UPDATE_TS,:ROW_ID,:ETC_DUP_SERIAL_NUM)
Update TPMS.T_AWAY_AGENCY_TX SET TX_STATUS=:TX_STATUS WHERE LANE_TX_ID = :LANE_TX_ID
UPDATE TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT SET FILE_STATUS_IND=?,RECORD_COUNT=? WHERE FILE_NAME =?
UPDATE TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT SET FILE_STATUS_IND=? WHERE FILE_NAME =?
INSERT INTO TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT (FILE_NAME,FILE_STATUS_IND,RECORD_COUNT) VALUES (:FILE_NAME,:FILE_STATUS_IND,:RECORD_COUNT)
